name: The Fall (itch) (anulagarwal)
description:
Install instructions

To open the game go into the folder named Final_Build_The_Fall. Within this folder open the executable file called Final_Build_Again. Select screen resolution as 1600x900 then play. To quit the application click the x at the top right of the window or click ALT + F4.

The main menu features two buttons. Play brings you to the first level in the game where the tutorial level will play. Level select brings the players to a menu where they can select one of the thirteen levels.

To play drag from center of ball out towards the direction you want to go. Releasing the left mouse button shoots the ball. The line shows the direction you will shoot the ball. Right clicking will restart the current level. Clicking escape will bring up the pause menu where you can resume gameplay, go to level select menu and exit to the main menu.
